vanAmahE dhukShIqmahi# praqjAmiSha$M || 
rOhi#tEna tvAq&gnirdEqvatA$M gamayatuq hari#ByAqM tvEndrO# dEqvatA$M gamayaqtvEta#SEna tvAq sUryO# dEqvatA$M gamayatuq vi tE# mu~jcAmi raSaqnA vi raqSmIn vi yOktrAq yAni# pariqcarta#nAni dhaqttAdaqsmAsuq dravi#NaqM ~Myacca# BaqdraM praNO$ brUtAd-BAgaqdhAn dEqvatA#su || 
viShNO$H Saqm~MyOraqhaM dE#vayaqjyayA# yaqj~jEna# pratiqShThAM ga#mEyaq(gm)q sOma#syAqhaM 
dE#vayaqjyayA# - [  ] 13
